HomePage.title: Expert development and staff augmentation services.
HomePage.description: We deliver high-quality web, mobile, and game development solutions while providing skilled developers for your team with remote-first expertise.

metadata.description: Expert web, mobile, and game development services plus staff augmentation with remote-first expertise.

php.name: PHP & Laravel
php.description: Robust backend development with modern PHP frameworks

react.name: React & Next.js
react.description: Dynamic web applications with server-side rendering

vue.name: Vue.js & Nuxt
vue.description: Progressive web apps with reactive user interfaces

reactNative.name: React Native
reactNative.description: Cross-platform mobile apps for iOS and Android

flutter.name: Flutter
flutter.description: Beautiful native mobile applications from single codebase

Services.title: Expert development and strategic staff augmentation.
Services.description: Whether you need a complete solution built from scratch or skilled developers to join your team, we deliver the expertise and partnership you need to succeed.

web.title: Web Development
web.description: Full-stack web applications using PHP/Laravel, React, Vue.js, Node.js, and Python. From e-commerce platforms to custom enterprise solutions built for performance and scalability.

mobile.title: Mobile Development
mobile.description: Native and cross-platform mobile applications using React Native and Flutter. iOS and Android apps that deliver exceptional user experiences across all devices.

game.title: Game Development
game.description: Interactive games and experiences using Unity and HTML5. From mobile games to web-based interactive content that engages and entertains users.

staff.title: Staff Augmentation
staff.description: Skilled developers who integrate seamlessly with your team. Short-term and long-term remote engagements to scale your development capacity with proven expertise.

Testimonial.quote: Aesir's developers integrated perfectly with our team and delivered a complex patient management system on time and within budget. Their expertise in Laravel and React helped us modernize our entire platform.

newsletter.title: Stay updated with Aesir
newsletter.description: Subscribe to get the latest technology insights, industry news, and updates from our team.
